mapper.select: SELECT r.cmtid, c.comments, c.tid, c.mid ,m.mname, c.cmtkind, c.cmtmtime, r.isarchive, t.tname, p.pname,m.image FROM RECEIVER r JOIN COMMENTS c ON r.CMTID = c.CMTID join task t on t.tid=c.tid join project p on p.pid =t.pid join member m on c.mid = m.mid where r.mid=#{mid} and r.ISARCHIVE = 0 and r.mid != c.mid ORDER BY c.cmtmtime DESC

select DISTINCT r.cmtid, c.comments, c.tid, c.mid ,m.mname, c.cmtkind, c.cmtmtime, r.isarchive, t.tname, p.pname, m.image from RECEIVER r join COMMENTS c on r.CMTID = c.CMTID join task t on t.tid = c.tid join PROJECT p on p.pid = t.pid join member m on c.MID = m.MID where c.mid = #{mid} and r.ISARCHIVE = 0 and r.mid = c.mid ORDER BY c.cmtmtime DESC

SELECT r.cmtid, c.comments, c.tid, r.mid ,m.mname, c.cmtkind, c.cmtmtime, r.isarchive, t.tname, p.pname, m.image FROM RECEIVER r JOIN COMMENTS c ON r.CMTID = c.CMTID join task t on t.tid=c.tid join project p on p.pid =t.pid join member m on r.mid = m.mid where r.mid=#{mid} and r.ISARCHIVE = 1 ORDER BY c.cmtmtime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RECEIVER SET ISARCHIVE = 1 where mid=#{mid} and cmtid=#{cmtid}
UPDATE RECEIVER SET ISARCHIVE = 0 where mid=#{mid} and cmtid=#{cmtid}
